alert.note: Alert for Eastern, Central El Paso County (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 08 at 11:58AM CST until January 08 at 5:00PM CST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 40 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph. * WHERE...Eastern/Central El Paso County. * WHEN...Until 4 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds will last now until approximately 1PM.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
